instructions: Cook onion and half of the red pepper in butter in large saucepan on medium heat until tender, stirring frequently.
Add cream cheese; cook until melted, stirring constantly.
Add corn, broth, milk and turkey; mix well.
Cook until soup is heated through, stirring occasionally.
Serve topped with remaining chopped red pepper.
title: Creamy Corn and Turkey Soup
steps: Cook onion and half of the red pepper in butter in large saucepan on medium heat until tender, stirring frequently. Reduce heat to low.
Add cream cheese; cook until melted, stirring constantly. Add corn, broth, milk and turkey; mix well.
Cook until soup is heated through, stirring occasionally. Serve topped with remaining chopped red pepper.
